Entries

Will The Apple Fall? A VR Gravity Calculator Through Controller Movement Tracking and Gaze Interaction (ID: 1010)
Barnabas Lee, Independent; Miss Shu Wei, University of Oxford

Walk Me Through It: Using Impossible Spaces to Embody Graph Traversal Algorithms (ID: 1017)
Jasmine Joyce DeGuzman, University of Minnesota; Erik DeVries Smith, University of Minnesota; Samyok Nepal, University of Minnesota; Kalinda Miller, University of Minnesota; Courtney Hutton Pospick, University of Minnesota; Tongyu Nie, University of Minnesota; Evan Suma Rosenberg, University of Minnesota

Ruth Mesfin, University of Minnesota; Catherine Borisova, University of Minnesota; Tongyu Nie, University of Minnesota; Evan Suma Rosenberg, University of Minnesota

Calculus in Motion: 3D VR Exploration of Solids of Revolution (ID: 1014)
Ashley Katherine Chen, University of Minnesota; Wanbo Geng, University of Minnesota; Evan Suma Rosenberg, University of Minnesota

FT Player —— Oh! This is the Fourier Transform! (ID: 1012)
Jiaqi Hou, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications; Shiyao Liu, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications; Weixiang Li, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications; Tiemeng Li, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

Beyond Euclid: An Educational Virtual Reality Journey into Spherical Geometry (ID: 1002)
Agapi Chrysanthakopoulou, University of Patras; Theofilos Chrysikopoulos, University of Patras; Leandros Nikolaos Arvanitopoulos, University of Patras; Kostantinos Moustakas, University of Patras

Space-bending interaction: mastering deformations of non-euclidean spaces to cheat at golf (ID: 1001)
Romain Chabbert, Inria Rennes; Dr Rémi Coulon, Inria Rennes; Lysa Gramoli, Inria Rennes; Maé Mavromatis, Inria Rennes; Florian Nouviale, Inria Rennes; Adrien Reuzeau, Inria Rennes; Mathieu Risy, Inria Rennes; Sabrina Toofany, Inria Rennes; Ronan Gaugne, Inria Rennes; Valérie Gouranton, Inria Rennes

PokeDotz: a fun, immersive and interactive mathematical sandbox with rich feature numbers representations in virtual reality (ID: 1015)

Barbosa, University of Sao Paulo; Gabriela Barion Vidal, University of Sao Paulo; Roseli de Deus Lopes Lopes, University of Sao Paulo; Marcelo Knorich Zuffo, University of Sao Paulo; Eduardo Zilles Borba, University of Sao Paulo

The Alchemist: A Gesture-Based 3D User Interface for Engaging Arithmetic Calculations (ID: 1016)
Logan Lane, Virginia Tech; Alexander Giovannelli, Virginia Tech; Ibrahim Asadullah Tahmid, Virginia Tech; Francielly Rodrigues, National Library for Scientific Computing Brazil; Cory Ilo, Virginia Tech; Darren Hsu, Virginia Tech; Christos Lougiakis, University of Athens; Shakiba Davari, Virginia Tech; Doug Bowman, Virginia Tech

Slicing and Grabbing: A Natural Interaction Technique for Visualizing Parallel Isolines on 3D Surfaces (ID: 1003)
